short_summary: Supply of materials for constructing four gabion walls along terraces in CFS Alert.
description: The provision of materials to execute an approved design to improve the existing wastewater treatment system through construction of four Gabion Walls along Terraces in CFS Alert during the summer seasons. The goods will be sent to CFB ALERT, via delivered to CFB Trenton.
full_summary:
# W0125-24WR18 Terrace Gabion Walls - Inuit Firm Registry Listed Bidders Only

## Contract Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4401624234
* **Document ID**: Doc4432407497
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-07
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-08T12:00:00
* **Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-10
* **Contract End Date**: 2024-09-25

## Contract Description

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of materials and construction services to improve the existing wastewater treatment system at CFS Alert, Nunavut. The proposed project involves the construction of four Gabion Walls along Terraces. Only Inuit firm registry listed bidders can participate in this tender.

## Identification of Procuring Entities

* **Procuring Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing and installing Gabion Walls to improve the existing wastewater treatment system. The scope of work includes:

* Providing Gabion Walls materials
* Executing an approved design
* Constructing four Gabion Walls along Terraces

## Instructions to Bidders

* Only bidders listed in the Inuit Firm Registry can participate in this tender.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2024-04-26 by 12:00 PM EST.
* All bids submitted after 12:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

## Contracting Entity and Purchase Specialist

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Purchase Specialist**: Christopher Harvey
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Email: [christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Telephone: (519) 671-2396

## Request for Proposal Documents

* The RFP documents can be accessed through the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19022314?extsite=MTkwMjIzMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that I removed unnecessary information and condensed the text to fit within the 400-word limit
